mapper.update: update /*中转推送轨迹模块-重置推送轨迹jobid*/ tfr.t_opt_expresstrack_external et set et.job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, et.modify_time = sysdate where et.job_id !='N/A'
mapper.delete: delete /*中转推送轨迹模块-处理成功删除轨迹*/ tfr.t_opt_expresstrack_external et where et.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update /*中转推送轨迹模块-更新没有处理完成数据的jobid为N/A*/ tfr.t_opt_expresstrack_external et set et.job_id = 'N/A', et.modify_time = sysdate, et.CTR_PUSH_N = (select nvl(CTR_PUSH_N,0)+1 from tfr.t_opt_expresstrack_external where id = #{id}) where et.id = #{id}
